KeyNotes.SEWERNOTES: INSTALL PVC SEWER MAIN PER MSD XXX, LENGTH, SLOPE AND SIZE AS NOTED.
INSTALL 4' I.D. MANHOLE PER MSD XXX, FRAME AND COVER PER MSD XXX.
INSTALL 5' I.D. MANHOLE PER MSD XXX, FRAME AND COVER PER MSD XXX.
INSTALL 6" SEWER CLEANOUT PER MSD XXX.
INSTALL 4" SEWER SERVICE PER MSD XXX.
LOCATE EXISTING SEWER MAIN, CUT IN NEW 5' I.D. MANHOLE PER MSD XXX, RIM PER MSD XXX.
KeyNotes.PAVINGNOTES: INSTALL HEAVY DUTY PAVING (3" AC OVER 8" ABC) PER GEOTECHNICAL REPORT PREPARED BY SPEEDIE AND ASSOCIATES DATED MARCH 14, 2017 WITH PROJECT NUMBER 150898SA, UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED BY HARDSCAPE PLANS. FINISH, COLOR AND SCORING PER HARDSCAPE PLANS. ANY ALTERNATES ARE TO BE APPROVED BY GEOTECHNICAL ENGINEER.
INSTALL CONCRETE PAVING (7" THICK) OVER SUBGRADE PREPARED PER GEOTECHNICAL REPORT REQUIREMENTS.
INSTALL CONCRETE PAVING (7" THICK) OVER SUBGRADE PREPARED PER GEOTECHNICAL REPORT REQUIREMENTS. FINISH, COLOR AND SCORING PER HARDSCAPE PLANS.
INSTALLL STABILIZED DECOMPOSED GRANITE SURFACE OVER 6" ABC OVER 12" COMPACTED SUBGRADE PER GEOTECHNICAL REPORT. THICKNESS, FINISH, COLOR AND GRADATION PER HARDSCAPE PLANS.
INSTALL PRECAST CONCRETE PAVERS PER HARDSCAPE PLANS.
INSTALL 6" CURB AND GUTTER PER M.A.G. STD. DTL. 220-1, TYPE A.
INSTALL 6" SINGLE CURB PER M.A.G. STD. DTL. 222, TYPE A.
INSTALL SIDEWALK PER C.O.T. STD. DTL. T-345. FINISH, COLOR AND SCORING PER HARDSCAPE PLANS.
INSTALL DRIVEWAY PER C.O.T. STD. DTL. T-320.
INSTALL SIDEWALK SCOOP RAMP PER C.O.T. STD. DTL. T-348, TYPE D.
TRANSITION CURB FROM 6" TO FLUSH AS NOTED.
SAWCUT AND REMOVE 2' MIN. EXISTING ASPHALT PAVING AS NECESSARY TO FACILITATE NEW CONSTRUCTION. REPLACE PER M.A.G. STD. DTL. 200-1, TYPE 'B'.
SAWCUT AND REMOVE 2' MIN EXISTING ASPHALT PAVING AS NECESSARY TO FACILITATE NEW CONSTRUCTION. REPLACE PER M.A.G. STD. DTL. 200-1, 'T-TOP'. ADJUST MANHOLE FRAME AND COVER PER M.A.G. STD. DTL. 422.
REMOVE EXISTING SIDEWALK, CURB AND GUTTER TO NEAREST CONSTRUCTION JOINT AS NECESSARY TO FACILITATE NEW CONSTRUCTION.
INSTALL CURB TERMINATION PER M.A.G. STD. DTL. 222.
MATCH LINE AND GRADE OF EXISTING FINISH GRADE.
ADJUST GRATE/MANHOLE RIM PER M.A.G. STD. DTL. 422.
ADJUST VALVE BOX PER M.A.G. STD. DTL. 391-1.
INSTALL SCREEN WALL, SEE ARCHITECT'S PLANS FOR DETAILS. SEE STRUCTURAL PLANS FOR FOOTING DETAILS.
INSTALL RETAINING WALL, SEE LANDSCAPE PLANS FOR DETAILS.
INSTALL 6 INCH STEPS/RISERS W/HANDRAILS. SEE ARCHITECT'S PLANS FOR DETAILS.
INSTALL PAVEMENT STRIPING. SEE NOTES SHEET 2 OF THIS PLAN SET.
INSTALL RETENTION BASIN AS SHOWN. FILL MATERIAL MUST BE CLEAN AND FREE OF DELETERIOUS MATERIAL. LIFT HEIGHTS AND COMPACTION SHALL BE PER M.A.G. STD. SPECIFICATIONS.
INSTALL 7" CURB AND GUTTER PER M.A.G. STD. DTL. 222, TYPE A. H=7"
INSTALL DETECTABLE WARNING PER C.O.T. STD. DTL. T-329.
INSTALL GUARD RAIL PER ADOT STD. DTL. C-10.03, G4(2W) SYSTEM.
INSTALL ADA COMPLIANT RAMP AS SHOWN. INSTALL DETECTABLE WARNING PER C.O.T. STD. DTL. T-329.
INSTALL 12-FOOT WIDE GATE. SEE LANDSCAPE PLANS FOR DETAILS.
INSTALL TRASH ENCLOSURE. SEE ARCHITECT'S PLANS FOR DETAILS.
INSTALL RIBBON CURB PER M.A.G. STD. DTL. 220-1, TYPE 'B', MODIFIED FOR 6" WIDTH.
INSTALL BOLLARD PER M.A.G. STD. DTL. 140, TYPE 1/ SEE LANDSCAPE PLANS FOR DETAILS.
REPLACE SURVEY MONUMENT PER M.A.G. STD. DTL. 120, TYPE 'A'.
INSTALL BUS SHELTER PER C.O.T. STD. DTL. T-654.
INSTALL WALK WITH INTEGRAL SAFETY RAIL AND RETAINING WALL. SEE DETAIL SHEET 11.
INSTALL CONCRETE LINED SWALE. SEE DETAIL SHEET 11.
INSTALL STEPS AND HANDRAIL. SEE LANDSCAPE PLANS FOR DETAILS.
KeyNotes.GRADINGNOTES: MATCH LINE AND GRADE OF EXISTING PAVEMENT, TACK AND MATCH PER DETAIL SHEET XX.
MATCH LINE AND GRADE OF EXISTING PAVEMENT, TACK AND MATCH PER DETAIL SHEET XX.
MATCH LINE AND GRADE OF EXISTING PAVEMENT, TACK AND MATCH PER DETAIL SHEET XX.
MATCH LINE AND GRADE OF EXISTING PAVEMENT, TACK AND MATCH PER DETAIL SHEET XX.
MATCH LINE AND GRADE OF EXISTING PAVEMENT, TACK AND MATCH PER DETAIL SHEET XX.
KeyNotes.STORMNOTES: INSTALL CATCH BASIN TYPE 'F' PER M.A.G. STD. DTL. 535.

INSTALL H.D.P.E. DRAINAGE PIPE OR APPROVED EQUAL TO INVERT ELEVATIONS SHOWN PER M.A.G. SPEC. 621. EXCAVATION, BEDDING AND BACKFILL PER M.A.G. SPEC. 601 AND MATERIALS PER M.A.G. SPEC. 760. SEE PLAN FOR PIPE SIZE AND LENGTHS.
INSTALL 9.5'∅ CAST IN PLACE CONCRETE PIPE BY BLUCOR (OR APPROVED EQUAL)
INSTALL INLET PER M.A.G. STD. DTL. 530, TYPE 'A'. INVERTS PER PLAN.
INSTALL 48"∅ C.M.P. MANHOLE WITH FRAME AND GRATE COVER. SEE DETAIL SHEET FOR ADDITIONAL INFORMATION.
INSTALL STORM DRAIN MANHOLE PER M.A.G. STD. DTL. 520 (BASE), 522 (SHAFT), AND M.A.G. STD. DTL. 423-1 TYPE 'B' FRAME AND COVER.
CONNECT TO STORAGE PIPE. SEE DETAIL SHEET.
CONNECT TO ROOF LEADER DISCHARGE PIPING. SEE MEP PLANS FOR CONTINUATION.
INSTALL PVC (SDR 35) PIPE. LENGTH, SLOPE AND SIZE PER PLAN.
INSTALL MAXWELL PLUS DRYWELL AS DISTRIBUTED BY TORRENT RESOURCES (OR APPROVED EQUAL). SEE DETAIL SHEET FOR ADDITIONAL INFORMATION.
INSTALL WYE CONNECTION. INVERTS PER PLAN.
INSTALL NEW PRECAST 3'x4' CONCRETE JUNCTION BOX WITH GRATE TOP PER M.A.G STD. DTL. 535 (OLDCASTLE OR APPROVED EQUAL).
INSTALL END CAP PER M.A.G. STD. DTL. 427.
